ygData.subject: Re: twinked? / EQ ettiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, you pegged me right on the nose! :) I m the person who s license plate frame says I don t discriminate, I hate everyone! And yes, I hate it when people
ygData.messageBody:
Well, you pegged me right on the nose! :) I'm the
person who's license plate frame says "I don't
discriminate, I hate everyone!" And yes, I hate
it when people bump into me...

--- Jonathan <jpeck@...> wrote:
> Being a rather high level warrior.. I get
> inspected constantly by lowbies
> and I inspect/am inspected by people my level
> all the time. It in no way
> bothers me, and if it does, it just shows
> you're getting into the game a
> little too much. The only time this should
> ever make you feel uneasy is if
> you're on a PvP server because they're scoping
> for your items to see if they
> should kill you usually. If this honestly
> bothers you, I would imagine you
> the type of person who is claustrophobic or who
> gets upset if someone bumps
> into you in the subway or something along those
> lines. Eventually, you'll
> take it with an air of pride must likely,
> because it's usually just newbies
> gawking over your equipment.
>

> > I find it kind of rude for people to be
> snooping
> > in other peoples stuff! Is 'inspect' a
> totally
> > accepted thing, or is there some sort of
> > ettiquette that goes along with it? I don't
> mind
> > so much if I've been chatting with someone
> for a
> > little while and they take a peek [it's not
> like
> > I have anything good to hide!] but when
> people
> > come right up to you, snoop, and then don't
> even
> > respond when you say 'Hail' , I find that
> > extremely annoying. Any comments, guys?
> >
> > Sinarya
> > 6th DE Necromancer


=====
* Selene *
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"All my life I've told people that they can live without the gods... Now I guess we'll find out." Hercules <Xena: Warrior Princess> 'God Fearing Child'

"Ten of your American dollars says God is a woman." Emilia
"Well, that explains why we're always trying to please her and nothing we ever do is good enough!" Jack <Jack of All Trades> 'Floundering Fathers'
